text: Yi anasthavadile yo jivanama juna dhana kharca gardachan tyasako udaharana tyasa hi'umle bhari'eko batasa jasto cha, juna an'yaya garne manisaharuko khetiko mathi calyo ra tyasala'i tahasa nahasa paridiyo. Allahale tiniharumathi kunai atyacara gareko chaina, baru tiniharu aphaile aphumathi atyacara garirakheka chan
